en.help_message: Here is how you can use the bot...
en.login_success: Successfully authenticated! Session will expire in 1 hour.
en.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
en.locked_out: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
en.not_authenticated: You are not logged in. Please authenticate using /login <password>.
en.choose_temp_unit: Please choose your preferred temperature unit:
en.extended_loading: This is taking longer than expected.
en.connection_failed: IoT device cannot be accessed. Please contact your admin!
en.network_error: Networking issue. Please contact your admin!
en.unknown_error: Unknown error processing request: {error}. Please try again!
en.greeting: Hello there, how can I be of Service?
en.already_authenticated: You are already authenticated. Please log out first.
en.coap_credentials_error: Error: No suitable credentials for accessing the CoAP server.
en.llm_unavailable:
The LLM is currently unavailable. Please try again later. 
Please fall back to the hardcoded actions. 
/help - to get a list of available actions. 
/temp - to get the current temperature. 
/internal_temp - to get the current internal temperature. 
/external_temp - to get the current external temperature. 
/humidity - to get the humidity. 
/logout - to log out of this session. 
/lang - to set your preferred language. 
/tempunit - to set your preferred temperature unit.
en.help:
This bot can access the sensors of your connected iot device. 
Either use: 
/help - to get a list of available actions. 
/temp - to get the current temperature. 
/internal_temp - to get the current internal temperature. 
/external_temp - to get the current external temperature. 
/humidity - to get the humidity. 
/logout - to log out of this session. 
/lang - to set your preferred language. 
/tempunit - to set your preferred temperature unit. 
Or try the llm to give you an answer.
en.unknown_command:
The requested action is unknown. 
Either use: 
/help - to get a list of available actions. 
/temp - to get the current temperature. 
/internal_temp - to get the current internal temperature. 
/external_temp - to get the current external temperature. 
/humidity - to get the humidity. 
/logout - to log out of this session. 
/lang - to set your preferred language. 
/tempunit - to set your preferred temperature unit. 
Or try to rephrase your request for the llm to give you an answer.
en.choose_temperature_sensor: Please choose, which temperature sensor you want to use:
en.external_temp_requested: The external temperature has been requested.
en.internal_temp_requested: The internal temperature has been requested.

de.help:
Dieser Bot kann auf die Sensoren deines verbundenen IoT-Ger√§ts zugreifen. 
Verwende entweder: 
/help - um eine Liste der verf√ºgbaren Aktionen zu erhalten. 
/temp - um die aktuelle Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/internal_temp - um die interne Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/external_temp - um die externe Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/humidity - um die Luftfeuchtigkeit zu erhalten. 
/logout - um dich von dieser Sitzung abzumelden. 
/lang - um deine bevorzugte Sprache einzustellen. 
/tempunit - um eine bevozugte Temperatureinheit zu setzen. 
Oder versuche das llm, um dir eine Antwort geben zu lassen.
de.unknown_command:
Die angeforderte Aktion ist unbekannt. 
Verwende entweder: 
/help - um eine Liste der verf√ºgbaren Aktionen zu erhalten. 
/temp - um die aktuelle Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/internal_temp - um die interne Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/external_temp - um die externe Temperatur zu erhalten. 
/humidity - um die Luftfeuchtigkeit zu erhalten. 
/logout - um dich von dieser Sitzung abzumelden. 
/lang - um deine bevorzugte Sprache einzustellen. 
/tempunit - um eine bevozugte Temperatureinheit zu setzen. 
Oder versuche deine Anfrage umzuformulieren, damit das llm dir eine Antwort geben kann.
